## Public Member Functions

### lowerAsmOperandForConstraint() {#ad76d409865bd147da020b46aa7525013}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool SPIRVInlineAsmLowering::lowerAsmOperandForConstraint (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; Val, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Constraint, std::vector&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &gt; &amp; Ops, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineirbuilder">MachineIRBuilder</a> &amp; MIRBuilder) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Lower the specified operand into the Ops vector.

<code>Val</code> is the IR input value to be lowered <code>Constraint</code> is the user supplied constraint string <code>Ops</code> is the vector to be filled with the lowered operands 
<SectionUser title="Returns">
True if the lowering succeeds, false otherwise.
</SectionUser>
